attributes.action: Ban Microsoft In All Public Places, Including Schools And Council Offices.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many Public Places Have Equipment Running Too Much Microsoft Software.  This Is Just State Advertising. The High System Requirements For Microsoft Software Also Mean High Costs Required To Update To The Latest Microsoft Software. Most Alternatives Are Also Cheaper In Costs To Purchase, etc. The Rivals Are Now Reletively Easy To Use, And Most Staff Should Easily Adjust.
